data.comment: The match is underway. Stoke have kicked-off.
The home team have replaced Sam Clucas with Josh Tymon. This is the first substitution made today by Michael O'Neill.
In the minute 19, Goal! Stoke have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Nathan Collins.
Dael Fry (Middlesbrough) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, Middlesbrough have kicked-off the second half at bet365 Stadium.
Britt Assombalonga is replacing Chuba Akpom for the away team.
Patrick Roberts is replacing Marvin Johnson for Middlesbrough at bet365 Stadium.
In the minute 62, Middlesbrough make their third substitution with Duncan Watmore replacing Sam Morsy.
At bet365 Stadium, Tyrese Campbell has been yellow-carded for the home team.
George Saville (Middlesbrough) has received a yellow card from Jeremy Simpson.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Nick Powell with Tashan Oakley-Boothe.
Jacob Brown (Stoke) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Sam Folarin is on a sub for George Saville for Middlesbrough.
Neil Warnock is making the team's fifth substitution at bet365 Stadium with Lewis Wing replacing Marcus Tavernier.
Marc Bola is booked for the away team.
